game.name: Family Pool Time
game.description:
Hey friends! Today is a perfect day for swimming so your favorite princesses have planned to go to the pool and have fun together. Everything is ready, but a problem has suddenly come to them. They both have lost their outfits required to have fun in the pool so they want new swimsuits. These two sister girls need your help for that purpose. Please do not mind and come forward to guide them during shopping. Join Family Pool Time and be prepared to help them pick up new swimsuits! 

The good news is that the store you visit carries a wide and exclusive collection of pool dresses. You have to choose the swimsuits and other needful accessories for both of them to make their pool party something special. Your successful efforts will help bring some points and money through which you can buy some other cool accessories. Give her a nice pair of bra and panty and combine it with a cool and colorful skirt in this one of the best HTML5 dressing games for girls!

Do not forget to complete her look with an awesome goggle and a pair of slippers. Once you are done with the look of the first girl, try to follow the same process for the second girl as well. Try to put your best fashion abilities to the test to finalize the jaw-dropping looks for their pool party! Hope you would get the success in every girls dressing game. We are plenty of other pool dress up games that you can try on multiple devices without download. Good luck for a happy gaming experience, friends!!
